txt.en: 'Under the command of Sauron, I learned to train sûlokil. These beasts remain useful, as they move food and supplies with ease.\n\n'Go and feed the sûlokil I have tamed, for they must remain strong and healthy.'
'It took you a while to complete such a simple task. I am watching you, foolish [placeholder].'
Collect sûlok feed from the feed bag
Sûlokil can be found in Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should feed the sûlokil.
A feed bag can be found in Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should collect sûlok feed from the feed bag.
The Khundolar Commander can be found at Fushaum Bal North.\n\nYou should talk to the Khundolar Commander.
The encampment of Fushaum Bal is a lawless home to evil Men once under the command of Sauron.
